pullrequest.title: Components Part 2: Move header files to component folders

content.raw:
I suppose we could include it, but then we need to fix the logic here: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/102/components-part-2-move-header-files-to/diff#LCMakeLists.txtT110

But I'd probably recommend just leaving it out, because other things in the `graphics` component have dependencies that we don't try to find on Windows, so it won't be available once we componentize `ign-common`.
content.html:
I suppose we could include it, but then we need to fix the logic here: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/102/components-part-2-move-header-files-to/diff#LCMakeLists.txtT110

But I'd probably recommend just leaving it out, because other things in the graphics component have dependencies that we don't try to find on Windows, so it won't be available once we componentize ign-common.
